articles.author: Jason Cipriani
articles.title: 7 Apple Watch settings you should change right away - CNET
articles.description: We'll show you how to adjust activity goals, ditch random screenshots and stop Siri from always talking to you.
articles.content:
The default app grid isn't always the best. 
Angela Lang/CNET
After unboxing your shiny new Apple Watch and connecting it to your iPhone, it's easy to feel overwhelmed with all of the options and s… [+6865 chars]
